snacks.title: Dodster

snacks.title: Lunchbox with chicken wings
snacks.composition: A hearty, hot lunch of spiced and smoked chicken wings, oven baked potatoes with Italian herbs

snacks.title: Lunchbox with chicken pieces
snacks.composition: A hearty hot lunch of tender chicken pieces, oven baked potatoes with Italian herbs and cheese sauce

snacks.title: Danwich ham and cheese
snacks.composition: Grilled ciabatta and familiar combination of ham, chicken, mozzarella with fresh tomatoes

snacks.title: Cheese sticks with garlic
snacks.composition: A hearty snack for the company. On a lush dough - only cheese and garlic. And the ranch/garlic sauce included - it tastes better with it!

snacks.title: Cheese sticks with pesto
snacks.composition: A hearty snack for the company. On a lush dough - only cheese and garlic. And the ranch/garlic sauce included - it tastes better with it!

snacks.title: Chicken pieces
snacks.composition: Juicy chicken fillet in a crispy breading. Big portion

snacks.title: Chicken wings
snacks.composition: Chicken wings with spices and smoked aroma. Big portion

desserts.title: Cherry pie
desserts.composition: Cherry on the cake! Cottage cheese shortbread dough with berries, custard and almond petals

desserts.title: Cheesecake New York
desserts.composition: We tried a thousand desserts and finally found the favorite of the guests - the most delicate curd cheesecake

desserts.title: 2 Strawberry donuts
desserts.composition: The brightest duet. Two donuts with strawberry filling and colorful sprinkles

desserts.title: 2 Chocolate donuts
desserts.composition: This donut is so chocolatey you want to try it twice. Two donuts with chocolate filling and sprinkles

desserts.title: 2 Chocolate muffins
desserts.composition: The main course ends, the muffins begin with a chocolate base filling with white and milk chocolate cubes

desserts.title: 2 Chocolate cookies
desserts.composition: On the one hand, cookies are good, but two are even better. Combine dark, Belgian milk and white chocolate

desserts.title: Bracelets, 16 pcs
desserts.composition: These are fervent sweet rolls, in which a mix of natural lingonberries and condensed milk spun

desserts.title: Rolls with cinnamon, 16 pcs
desserts.composition: A dessert approved by our grandmothers. Hot sweet rolls with spicy cinnamon and sugar

desserts.title: Apple pie
desserts.composition: Shortcrust pastry dessert with apple filling. May contain raisins

warmdrinks.title: Cocoa with marshmallows
warmdrinks.composition: Hot cocoa with milk, delicate milk foam and vanilla marshmallows

warmdrinks.title: Coffee Coconut Latte
warmdrinks.composition: Hot espresso based drink with extra milk and coconut syrup

warmdrinks.title: Coffee Caramel Cappuccino
warmdrinks.composition: If not chocolate, then caramel! A cappuccino with caramel syrup is especially good

warmdrinks.title: Coffee Vanilla Cappuccino
warmdrinks.composition: This is a coffee drink with frothed milk and vanilla syrup

warmdrinks.title: Coffee Cappuccino
warmdrinks.composition: The king among coffee drinks is the classic cappuccino. For lovers of balanced coffee and milk taste

warmdrinks.title: Coffee Americano
warmdrinks.composition: A couple of sips of hot Americano and you'll be ready to conquer the day

warmdrinks.title: Raspberry Punch
warmdrinks.composition: Warming drink based on raspberry and black currant puree
